item.title: Camille add a quote by Nancy E. Turner
item.description: "I might like to have someone courting me. But it would have to be someone who is a square shooter and who has a train load of courage. And it would have to be someone who doesn't have to talk down to folks to feel good, or to tell a person they are worthless ifthey just made a mistake. And he'd have to be not too thin. Why, I remember hugging [my brother] Ernest was like warpping your arms around a fence post,and I love Ernest, but I want a man who can hold me down in a wind. Maybe he'd have to be pretty stubborn. I don't have any use for a man that isn't stubborn. Likely a stubborn fellow will stay with you through thick and thin, and a spineless one will take off, or let his heart wander." -- Nancy E. Turner

item.title: Camille add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Camille add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Camille add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Camille add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Camille add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Camille add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Camille add a quote by Lisa Wingate
item.description: "Sometimes we must try to view the actions of those around us with forgiveness. We must realize that they are going on the only road they can see. Sometimes we cannot raise our chins and see eye to eye, so we must bow our heads and have faith in one another." -- Lisa Wingate

item.title: Camille add a quote by Lisa Wingate
item.description: "Your children are the greatest gift God will give to you, and their souls the heaviest responsibility He will place in your hands. Take time with them, teach them to have faith in God. Be a person in whom they can have faith. When you are old, nothing else you've done will have mattered as much." -- Lisa Wingate

item.title: Camille add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "In the unlikely story that is America, there has never been anything false about hope." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Camille add a quote by Nancy E. Turner
item.description: "Sometimes I feel like a tree on a hill, at the place where all the wind blows and the hail hits the tree the hardest. All the people I love are down the side aways, sheltered under a great rock, and I am out of the fold, standing alone in the sun and the snow. I feel like I am not part of the rest somehow, although they welcome me and are kind. I see my family as they sit together and it is like theyh ave a certain way between them that is beyond me. I wonder if other folks ever feel included yet alone." -- Nancy E. Turner

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When his life was ruined, his family killed, his farm destroyed, Job knelt down on the ground and yelled up to the heavens, "Why god? Why me?" and the thundering voice of God answered, There's just something about you that pisses me off." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Sometimes being a bitch is all a woman's got to hold on to." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are the perfect entertainment: no commercials, no batteries, hours of enjoyment for each dollar spent. What I wonder is why everybody doesn't carry a book around for those inevitable dead spots in life." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The road to hell is paved with adverbs." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The most important things are the hardest to say. They are the things you get ashamed of, because words diminish them -- words shrink things that seemed limitless when they were in your head to no more than living size when they're brought out. But it's more than that, isn't it? The most important things lie too close to wherever your secret heart is buried, like landmarks to a treasure your enemies would love to steal away. And you may make revelations that cost you dearly only to have people look at you in a funny way, not understanding what you've said at all, or why you thought it was so important that you almost cried while you were saying it. That's the worst, I think. When the secret stays locked within not for want of a tellar but for want of an understanding ear." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The scariest moment is always just before you start." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The thing under my bed waiting to grab my ankle isn't real. I know that, and I also know that if I'm careful to keep my foot under the covers, it will never be able to grab my ankle." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "There are books full of great writing that don't have very good stories. Read sometimes for the story... don't be like the book-snobs who won't do that. Read sometimes for the words--the language. Don't be like the play-it-safers who won't do that. But when you find a book that has both a good story and good words, treasure that book." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are a uniquely portable magic." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Humor is almost always anger with its make-up on." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The beauty of religious mania is that it has the power to explain everything. Once God (or Satan) is accepted as the first cause of everything which happens in the mortal world, nothing is left to chance...logic can be happily tossed out the window." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I think that we're all mentally ill. Those of us outside the asylums only hide it a little better - and maybe not all that much better after all." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "You can't deny laughter; when it comes, it plops down in your favorite chair and stays as long as it wants." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Alone. Yes, that's the key word, the most awful word in the English tongue. Murder doesn't hold a candle to it and hell is only a poor synonym." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Running a close second [as a writing lesson] was the realization that stopping a piece of work just because it's hard, either emotionally or imaginatively, is a bad idea. Sometimes you have to go on when you don't feel like it, and sometimes you're doing good work when it feels like all you're managing is to shovel shit from a sitting position." -- Stephen King

item.title: Camille add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "That wasn't any act of God. That was an act of pure human fuckery." -- Stephen King
